text:
February 7, 2017 by Hemant Mehta Leave a Comment 
In case you haven’t been to a megachurch lately, you’re not missing anything important. 
At least that’s the conclusion you’ll reach after you watch these clips from Sunday’s service at Crossroads Church in Cincinnati, Ohio. They wanted to compete with the Super Bowl, so they held a preaching “competition” that included ass-slapping, a crotch joke, sexual innuendo masquerading as humor, and one of the pastors wondering out loud why so many people want nothing to do with evangelicals. 
The full service is right here , in case you need proof that this video is real. 
Hey, pastor: This video is just one of many, many answers to your question. 
Also, this is a really weird way to tell everyone gay people don’t deserve equal rights.
